title: Yesterday's witness: the first boy scouts
creator_credit: Tim Byford, Stephen Peet and British Broadcasting Corporation
brief_description: Three of the Brownsea Island boys, who accompanied Baden-Powell on the first camp in 1907, recall the first days of scounting. lady Baden-Powell talks about her life with Lord Baden-Powell. Also considers the social context of scouting, and its state of development.
creator_credit_for_label: Tim Byford, Stephen Peet and British Broadcasting Corporation
